name: Snibbetracker Module
summary: A SNIBB file is an audio module created by Snibbetracker, a music tracker developed for creating and playing digital music. It contains the patterns, notes, instrument data, volume levels, and timing information that make up a music composition created in Snibbetracker. SNIBB files allow musicians to build detailed, sample-based music that can be played back using the same samples and settings every time.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
